explains: v. （使）压缩，（使）收缩；限制，约束；（蛇）盘绕以使窒息

sentences.en: At the same time, blood vessels constrict in the nose and throat, where bacteria and viruses often lurk.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，鼻子和喉咙——这里是细菌和病毒常常潜伏的地方——的血管收缩。

sentences.en: "Oxidative stress can also cause arteries to constrict by destroying nitric oxide," Prof Griffith warned.
sentences.cn: 格里菲斯教授警告说：“氧化应激也会因摧毁一氧化氮而导致动脉收缩。”

sentences.en: To conserve blood that will be needed by muscles, skin vessels constrict while vessels of the muscles dilate.
sentences.cn: 为了保存肌肉所需要的血液，皮肤血管收缩，而肌肉血管舒张。
